# Vascular Supply

DCML is vascularized by the posterior spinal arteries @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019

:::{.callout-note title="Clinical Significance"}
Since the DCML is supplied by the posterior spinal arteries, it is not included in anterior cord syndrome when the anterior spinal artery is compromised @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019.
:::
